name: bluesky_create_post
description: Navigate to Bluesky compose screen to create a new post. Opens the new post composer with pre-filled text. Requires being logged in.

steps.code: const composeBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid="composePromptButton"], button[aria-label*="New"], [class*="compose"] button'); if (composeBtn) { composeBtn.click(); } return { status: composeBtn ? 'compose_opened' : 'compose_button_not_found', text_to_post: `{{text}}`, note: 'The compose dialog has been opened. The text needs to be typed manually or pasted by the user.', url: window.location.href }
steps.name: compose_data
steps.label: Open compose dialog
